content:
According to the recently established convention that 'Rank' refers to the rank of a matroid in lemma names, #21605 renames three typeclasses that abbreviated it as Rk.

I am pretty sure there will be minimal impact in terms of downstream projects, and any such impact will be trivial to fix, so I have just added deprecations for the class names themselves, rather than doing all the duplications needed for the lemmas.
See #mathlib4 > Matroid rank - naming poll for the context to the renaming.
(The convention has already been enacted in docs#Matroid.cRank and docs#Matroid.cRk, for example)
